name: Balance In The Mountains
description:
Balance in the Mountains - a game in which there is no plot or complex gameplay, the main meaning of this game when creating was - to relax the player and enjoy the addictive gameplay, cartoon graphics.
In this game you will be in the role of a man to balance on the Board a certain amount of time, your task - to evade the stone and hold on to the Board without dropping your heart, if successful, you go to the next level where the campaign passing you will encounter additional obstacles that complicate gameplay.
